actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

official_title: To amend the Workforce Innovation and Opportunity Act to increase the authorization of appropriations for youth workforce investment activities.
short_title: Empowering Youth Through Summer Employment Act

summary.text:
Empowering Youth Through Summer Employment Act

This bill amends the Workforce Innovation and Opportunity Act to: (1) increase the authorization of appropriations for youth workforce investment activities (relating to migrant and seasonal workers) for FY2018-FY2020, and (2) extend such authorization through FY2022.

titles.title: To amend the Workforce Innovation and Opportunity Act to increase the authorization of appropriations for youth workforce investment activities.
